Comment.Text: Overview This scenario calculate the threshold used for Beta rebound detection in Use-the-force application. Compute the Mean and Variance of the Beta activity during 30sec of inactivity.
Use Generic stream reader instead of Acquisition client to replay recorded signals
The processing chain filter the signal in the [16-24Hz] frequency band (Beta band) Then, it select 1s epochs every 0.1s. This signal is squared and average to get the Beta power.
